alfredsnippet.snippet:
Fenton and Fenton, Fossils, p.51

"Most geologists today use such a theory [plate tectonics] as a working model, but not all accept it or totally agree with it.  As with science in general, it will stand as a useful idea until something more workable is put forward.  Questioning the correctness of it is a necessary part of good science and should always be heartily encouraged."
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Questioning the Correctness of a Working Model is a Necessary Part of Good Science
